verses.verse: And at that time <WH6256> shall Mikha'el <WH4317> stand up <WH5975> <WH8799>, the great <WH1419> prince <WH8269> which standeth <WH5975> <WH8802> for the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971>: and there shall be <WH1961> <WH8738> a time <WH6256> of trouble <WH6869>, such as never was since there was a nation <WH1471> even to that same time <WH6256>: and at that time <WH6256> thy people <WH5971> shall be delivered <WH4422> <WH8735>, every one that shall be found <WH4672> <WH8737> written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the book <WH5612>.

And many <WH7227> of them that sleep <WH3463> in the dust <WH6083> of the earth <WH127> shall awake <WH6974> <WH8686>, some to everlasting <WH5769> life <WH2416>, and some to shame <WH2781> and everlasting <WH5769> contempt <WH1860>.

And they that be wise <WH7919> <WH8688> shall shine <WH2094> <WH8686> as the brightness <WH2096> of the firmament <WH7549>; and they that turn many <WH7227> to righteousness <WH6663> <WH8688> as the stars <WH3556> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.

But thou, O Daniel <WH1840>, shut up <WH5640> <WH8798> the words <WH1697>, and seal <WH2856> <WH8798> the book <WH5612>, even to the time <WH6256> of the end <WH7093>: many <WH7227> shall run to and fro <WH7751> <WH8787>, and knowledge <WH1847> shall be increased <WH7235> <WH8799>.

Then I Daniel <WH1840> looked <WH7200> <WH8804>, and, behold, there stood <WH5975> <WH8802> other <WH312> two <WH8147>, the one <WH259> on this side <WH2008> of the bank <WH8193> of the river <WH2975>, and the other <WH259> on that side of the bank <WH8193> of the river <WH2975>.

And one said <WH559> <WH8799> to the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> <WH8803> in linen <WH906>, which was upon <WH4605> the waters <WH4325> of the river <WH2975>, How long shall it be to the end <WH7093> of these wonders <WH6382> ?

And I heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> <WH8803> in linen <WH906>, which was upon <WH4605> the waters <WH4325> of the river <WH2975>, when he held up <WH7311> <WH8686> his right hand <WH3225> and his left hand <WH8040> unto heaven <WH8064>, and sware <WH7650> <WH8735> by him that liveth <WH2416> for ever <WH5769> that it shall be for a time <WH4150>, times <WH4150>, and an half <WH2677>; and when he shall have accomplished <WH3615> <WH8763> to scatter <WH5310> <WH8763> the power <WH3027> of the holy <WH6944> people <WH5971>, all these things shall be finished <WH3615> <WH8799>.
And I heard <WH8085> <WH8804>, but I understood <WH995> <WH8799> not: then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, O my YY <WH113>, what shall be the end <WH319> of these things ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go thy way <WH3212> <WH8798>, Daniel <WH1840>: for the words <WH1697> are closed up <WH5640> <WH8803> and sealed <WH2856> <WH8803> till the time <WH6256> of the end <WH7093>.

Many <WH7227> shall be purified <WH1305> <WH8691>, and made white <WH3835> <WH8691>, and tried <WH6884> <WH8735>; but the wicked <WH7563> shall do wickedly <WH7561> <WH8689>: and none of the wicked <WH7563> shall understand <WH995> <WH8799>; but the wise <WH7919> <WH8688> shall understand <WH995> <WH8799>.

And from the time <WH6256> that the daily <WH8548> sacrifice shall be taken away <WH5493> <WH8717>, and the abomination <WH8251> that maketh desolate <WH8074> <WH8802> set up <WH5414> <WH8800>, there shall be a thousand <WH505> two hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days <WH3117>.
Blessed <WH835> is he that waiteth <WH2442> <WH8764>, and cometh <WH5060> <WH8686> to the thousand <WH505> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and five <WH2568> and thirty <WH7970> days <WH3117>.
But go thou thy way <WH3212> <WH8798> till the end <WH7093> be: for thou shalt rest <WH5117> <WH8799>, and stand <WH5975> <WH8799> in thy lot <WH1486> at the end <WH7093> of the days <WH3117>.
